A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Yooo.. This movie was garbage.. Even 30 yr. Fans were upset with the final product.. Now to be fair\,  it had moments\, but it wasn't worth sitting through 3 hours of dialogue for 10 minutes of action.. They showed everything in the highlights.. I am a fan of Star Wars\, but this was not worth my money or time.. Wouldn't even watch this joint on my fire stick..  I'm sorry\, but this was bad..
